oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Magnolia Blossoms - 1940-04-28 - Part 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC syndication Magnolia Blossoms, originating from WSM. Originally broadcast 1940-04-28, part 3. End of program that featured performances by the Fisk Jubilee Singers led by Mrs James Myers (Henrietta Myers), contralto soloist Emma Cornelia Pitt (spelling unconfirmed), and an orchestra led by Pietro Brescia.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Fisk Jubilee Singers; Pietro Brescia Orchestra
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Blank] / (0:38) Announcer performs the closing statements and credits over the closing theme song
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Magnolia blossoms (Radio program); Jubilee Singers; Brescia, Pietro; Myers, Henrietta Helena Crawley, 1878-1968
